Package Entities

Class MainCharacterTV

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Entities.MovingObject
Entities.MainCharacterTV
public class MainCharacterTV extends MovingObject
The main character class that will take care of drawing and updating.
Author:
Connor, Hayato, Rose, Joshua

    void
    pickUpObject(int index)
    Checks what the object that was picked up If it was a battery power up, the main character's life will increase and the battery will disappear If it was a puddle (trap), the main character's life will become 0 and the game will end If it was a keycard, then the main character will be able to leave the level

    void
    update()
    Checks if a key was pressed and updates accordingly of which direction the character should move on screen Also will check if there has been a collision with a solid Entities.tile

    • update

      public void update()
      Checks if a key was pressed and updates accordingly of which direction the character should move on screen Also will check if there has been a collision with a solid Entities.tile

    • pickUpObject

      public void pickUpObject(int index)
      Checks what the object that was picked up If it was a battery power up, the main character's life will increase and the battery will disappear If it was a puddle (trap), the main character's life will become 0 and the game will end If it was a keycard, then the main character will be able to leave the level
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the object collided with such as puddles, key cards or power ups

    • interactMonster

      public void interactMonster(int i)
      Checks if the index of the enemy array is valid and then makes the character's life 0 -> end game
      Parameters:
      i - index of the enemy

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the character
      Parameters:
      g2 - Graphics2D object associated with the game panel
